name: Inca's Cave
description: Inca's Cave is a Game Boy style puzzle game. Everything in this game is made by me. I have made the music, the assets, all the scripts etc. by myself. The map will get bigger, there will be new puzzles, and overall more stuff in later updates!  Quick note if u press R in the game, it respawns you in the respawn point, and will reset the place of boxes, and exiting game in the middle through gameplay can be done by pressing esc. I would be really thankful to receive feedback, so I could work more efficiently.
